title: sAdaramiha bhajE
sahitya:
sAdaramiha bhajE sarasijanAbham


anupallavi

  vEda nikaranuta mAdhIshu rushamiha
			(ciTTasvara sAhitya)
sAnati sarasa sAmAnUna vinuta kAmEna sama lalAma vilasita sAma japa lAhisAya


caraNam    pAlita tribhuvana
 caraNam 2    pApamahara samapAnupamAtana
 caraNam 3    mA pravinata krpAdrta girIsha kAma pArijAta rusama
 caraNam 4    pANDu sutanata pAda sarasija pAtita danuja pAvana parama
 caraNam 5    nityArihara mA rAma sujapa shOnim asmAti mOhanad-shana 
vasana pariNatarasa bhItara sashata krtu pramukhAnata nirupama
